text: hey folks -- I'm relatively new to working with APIS and while I understand the gist of things, one thing I can't really wrap my brain around is how to make a portal's API key private. I've seen it done in Angular apps where you can set it up serverside, but I'm not sure how to apply that theory to the HS file management system. Would any of you happen to have any pointers for me?
Hi <@UCH1L597V> Is there a way to use API without oauth. this is process will made in admin side or maybe schedule sync of contact of website to HubSpot.

Hi, <@UGXQK1B7Y>. Please don’t share full API keys in this public channel. For your security, I recommend resetting that key.

That said, if you’re getting that error, I suspect you’re using your developer API key (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/developer-hapikeys>) instead of the production API key (<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/integrations/how-do-i-get-my-HubSpot-api-key>) in the account where your contact records reside.

To answer your second question, yes. You can use either a _production_ API key or an OAuth token to retrieve and manipulate data in a production account: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/auth/oauth-overview>.

Hi, <@UAQHN1F2Q>. Apologies for the delayed response.

No, there is not. This endpoint is the only way to view the contents of the auto-save buffer at this time: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/pages/get_pages_page_id_buffer>.

Hey, <@UDFTHC6PK>. Happy to help clarify.

It sounds like you’re looking to use your API key to interact with the HubSpot file manager client-side. Is that accurate?

If so, most of HubSpot’s APIs (including the CMS Files API) do not support client-side requests as they expose your API key: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/do-HubSpot-apis-support-ajax-request>. As you mentioned, most set up server-side processes for uploading and managing files.

Please let me know if I’ve misunderstood your question!

Thanks <@UDDJG2VFG> -- I did figure that out with a little assist from Herzog - at this point I'm trying to find a solid tutorial on setting up an app -- but things are a bit sparse for a noob such as myself. The documentation is a few steps up from where I'm at -- any recommendations on some good learning material for setting up an integration for something like this?
the API key is located at Integration then API key right? this is not the apps API key?
<@UGXQK1B7Y> you `hapikey` is still there in the thread, can you please delete that or edit that ?
